name: GetBankAccountByV1Id
description: Returns details of a [BankAccount](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/BankAccount) identified by V1 bank account ID.

v1_bank_account_id.description:
Connect V1 ID of the desired `BankAccount`. For more information, see 
[Retrieve a bank account by using an ID issued by V1 Bank Accounts API](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/bank-accounts-api#retrieve-a-bank-account-by-using-an-id-issued-by-v1-bank-accounts-api).

$ul: **bank_account**: Represents a bank account. For more information about
**account_number_suffix**: The last few digits of the account number.
**account_type**: The financial purpose of the associated bank account.
**bank_name**: Read only. Name of actual financial institution.
**country**: The ISO 3166 Alpha-2 country code where the bank account is based.
**creditable**: Indicates whether it is possible for Square to send money to this bank account.
**currency**: The 3-character ISO 4217 currency code indicating the operating
**debit_mandate_reference_id**: Reference identifier that will be displayed to UK bank account owners
**debitable**: Indicates whether it is possible for Square to take money from this
**fingerprint**: A Square-assigned, unique identifier for the bank account based on the
**holder_name**: Name of the account holder. This name must match the name
**id**: The unique, Square-issued identifier for the bank account.
**location_id**: The location to which the bank account belongs.
**primary_bank_identification_number**: Primary identifier for the bank. For more information, see
**reference_id**: Client-provided identifier for linking the banking account to an entity
**secondary_bank_identification_number**: Secondary identifier for the bank. For more information, see
**status**: Read-only. The current verification status of this BankAccount object.
**errors**: Information on errors encountered during the request.
